name: soothe-bell
effect: Held : When the holder would earn happiness for any reason, it earns twice that amount instead.
short_effect: Held: Doubles the happiness earned by the holder.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bell with a comforting chime that calms the holder and makes it friendly.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bell with a comforting chime that calms the holder and makes it friendly.
